message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be highly valuable to you. I'm asking for $11,000.  I'm confident this is a fair price considering the benefits it offers.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $9,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but $9,000 is significantly below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $10,000?
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I am still not willing to pay more than $9,500 for the product.
